project-impact-180-frontend-dev-1.title: Frontend Developer
project-impact-180-frontend-dev-1.descrip: We need someone who is comfortable as a frontend developer. HTML/JS/CSS are required skills. Familiarity with React and Bootstrap (or similar) would be helpful!

project-impact-180-backend-dev-1.title: Backend Developer
project-impact-180-backend-dev-1.descrip: Looking for somebody to build and maintain the backend database for our website. Familiarity with C/C++ and SQL are recommended.

we-all-code-backend-full-stack-1.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
we-all-code-backend-full-stack-1.descrip: We are looking for somebody who is comfortable with full-stack web development. Our app currently uses React on the frontend & Django on the backend, so familiarity with these frameworks would be preferred. Additional bonus if currently pursuing a bachelor's or advanced degree in CS or a related field.

we-all-code-backend-android-1.title: Android Developer
we-all-code-backend-android-1.descrip: Seeking an Android developer proficient in Kotlin. Industry and/or relevant project experience preferred.

we-all-code-backend-ios-1.title: iOS Developer
we-all-code-backend-ios-1.descrip: Searching for an iOS developer with significant experience in Swift and/or Objective-C. Please reach out with a portfolio of prior iOS (or mobile) projects.

evanston-church-backend-design-1.title: Web Designer
evanston-church-backend-design-1.descrip: We are looking for somebody to build a website to match students with appropriate scholarship. Tech-stack is currently undecided, but we are thinking React or Angular on the frontend & Node.js on the backend. Added bonus if currently pursuing a bachelor's or advanced degree in CS.

evanston-church-backend-backend-1.title: Backend Mobile Developer
evanston-church-backend-backend-1.descrip: Searching for a developer proficient in React Native (goal is to deploy to both iOS and Android efficiently). Ideal candidate will be familiar with React/React Native, TypeScript, JavaScript, React Hooks, and Redux.

project-impact-180.title: Web Development for PI180 Website
project-impact-180.descrip: We need help building our website

we-all-code.title: Update Ongoing Classes
we-all-code.descrip: Help us maintain our weekly classes by integrating the information from our schedule into the website each week

evanston-church.title: Scholarship/Career Search
evanston-church.descrip: Help us build a platform to match our students with scholarships to apply for
